name: The Pre-Trials of a Shadow Runner
name_original: The Pre-Trials of a Shadow Runner
description:
This is a Platforming game submitted for the 2022 Gamedev.tv Game Jam.

Due to the theme: "Death is only the Beginning", the concept of this game rewrites the rules of a platforming game. Usually we tend to get punished by the game when we fail or we die. This one however, does the opposite. Yes, you will still be punished, but with a reward: the more that you die, your super will-power gauge fills up. When the Super Will-Power Gauge is at its peak, you have the option to become invincible for a limited amount of time.

The game is still on its limited levels, but I hope that you enjoy playing it:

Hotfix Update for v1.0.2:

- The Instructions Panel now pops out on the first level

- The slope on the first level is improved for playability

- The super gauge's size in UI was also improved.

- Sword Animation Bug where the Player keeps facing right instead of left is also fixed
